roleset.name: act as a clerk
roleset.note: CLERK-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from clerk.01-v)

role.descr: person, organization, event arg0 is acting as clerk for

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Following graduation, he clerked for the Honorable Edward Weinfeld of the U.S. District Court.
example.arg: for the Honorable Edward Weinfeld of the U.S. District Court

example.name: Another typical usage
example.text: Currently she is clerking for a commercial law practitioner.
